title: BEL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 90 Diploma Apprentice Posts
description: The Bharat Electronics Limited (BEL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 90 Diploma Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ Diploma in Civil, Electrical, Electronics, and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the BEL Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
